attributes.action: Get more restrictions on sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to get more restrictions to those on the sex offenders list. It woul be good that they could not travel abroad whilst on the sex offenders list. They would have an age restriction on who they could date, about 21 years or older. They will have to have checks on their internet every 6 months. Supervision around children. These restrictions are not yet in place and should be.
